job.title: Data Engineer (REMOTE)
job.description: ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob summaryltstronggt ltbrgtltbrgtthis technology role will report to the avp of data architecture ltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob dutiesltstronggt ltbrgtltbrgt ltulgtltligtwork as part of a data engineering team building allied worlds cloudbased data platform ltligt ltligtbuild the cloud infrastructure required for optimal extraction transformation and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources ltligt ltligtassemble large complex data sets that meet functional nonfunctional business requirements ltligt ltligtidentify design and implement internal process improvements automating manual processes optimizing data delivery redesigning infrastructure for greater scalability etc ltligt ltligtkeep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and aws regions ltligt ltligtwork with data and analytics team to strive for greater functionality in our data platform ltligt ltligthelp build and maintain a metricsdriven devops culture with a focus on automation and observability ltligtltulgt
